title: LoL Client Issues
body: So I was playing league earlier today and i wanted to update is to the new client, after I hit Upgrade now, I nothing happened so i hit the launch button. After that the client closed down and nothing happened, after many tries of restarting my computer an reopening the client nothing was working. PLEASE HELP!

replies.body:
Your client might be failing to locate the files in your directory to launch the update process.  Try the following steps to access the updated version.

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends
- Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe" and delete the file.
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

Let me know if that works for you.
